description:
The boys are forced to run during P.E.
Once they’re done, it’s the girl’s turn.
The boys decide running is awesome when they see
Galko running with her boobs swaying around.
Then, the teacher instructs them to run again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est vrai que t’as dormi chez ton amant ?
Is It True You Come to School After Being Out All Night?
朝帰り登校って本当ですか?
